kv4.8:5.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:8.5: Hañci bhagavā sayambhū, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.8:9.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:9.3: Bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle tīṇeva sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?
kv4.8:10.1: Nanu bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhānīti?
kv4.8:10.3: Hañci bhagavatā bodhiyā mūle cattāri sāmaññaphalāni abhisambuddhāni, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv4.8:11.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:12.1: Bodhisatto aparantapaṃ akāsi, aññaṃ satthāraṃ uddisīti?
kv4.8:13.1: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, āyasmā ānando bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:13.3: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:14.1: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:14.3: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:15.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:15.3: Āyasmā ānando bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:16.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:16.3: Citto gahapati hatthako āḷavako bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:17.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyo, na ca kassapassa bhagavato sāvakoti?
kv4.8:18.5: “kassape ahaṃ, ānanda, bhagavati brahmacariyaṃ acariṃ āyatiṃ sambodhāyā”ti.
kv4.8:19.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:24.1: “Yathā kho tvaṃ, āvuso, paṭijānāsi, arahasi anantajino”ti?
kv4.8:27.1: Bodhisatto kassapassa bhagavato pāvacane okkantaniyāmo caritabrahmacariyoti?
kv4.8:27.4: ‘idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
kv4.8:27.5: ‘Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pariññeyyan’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv4.8:27.7: pariññātanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi … pe … āloko udapādi.
kv4.8:27.12: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhasamudayaṃ ariyasaccaṃ pahātabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv4.8:27.18: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ sacchikātabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv4.8:27.22: ‘idaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccan’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv4.8:27.24: ‘taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabban’ti me, bhikkhave … pe …
kv4.8:27.26: bhāvitanti me, bhikkhave, pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
